languages.text: "Все разумные существа боятся встретить свой конец. Чтобы избавиться от страха — нужно сначала принять его".
"All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."
languages.original_text: "Все разумные существа боятся встретить свой конец. Чтобы избавиться от страха — нужно сначала принять его".

traits.locale_text: "All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."
"All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."
"All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."
"All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."
"All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."

languages.text: “没有人不畏惧死亡，但只有接受恐惧，才能战胜恐惧。”
languages.original_text: "All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."

traits.locale_text: “没有人不畏惧死亡，但只有接受恐惧，才能战胜恐惧。”

languages.text: «Todos los seres vivos temen la muerte. Para poder librarte de ese temor, primero has de aceptarlo».
languages.original_text: "All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los seres vivos temen la muerte. Para poder librarte de ese temor, primero has de aceptarlo».

languages.text: « Tous les êtres conscients ont peur de la mort. Vous devez accepter cette peur afin de pouvoir vous en défaire. »
languages.original_text: "All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les êtres conscients ont peur de la mort. Vous devez accepter cette peur afin de pouvoir vous en défaire. »

languages.text: "Alle Wesen mit Bewusstsein haben Angst vor dem Tod. Ihr müsst diese Angst zunächst akzeptieren, bevor Ihr Euch ihrer entledigen könnt."
languages.original_text: "All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Wesen mit Bewusstsein haben Angst vor dem Tod. Ihr müsst diese Angst zunächst akzeptieren, bevor Ihr Euch ihrer entledigen könnt."

languages.text: 「すべての知的生命体は死を恐れる。恐怖を振り払う前に、まずその恐怖を受け入れなければならない」
languages.original_text: "All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての知的生命体は死を恐れる。恐怖を振り払う前に、まずその恐怖を受け入れなければならない」

languages.text: "Bilinç sahibi tüm varlıklar, ölümden korkar. Korkundan kurtulmak için önce onu kabullenmen gerekir."
languages.original_text: "All sentient beings are afraid of death. You have to accept the fear first before you can get rid of it."

traits.locale_text: "Bilinç sahibi tüm varlıklar ölümden korkar. Korkundan kurtulmak için önce onu kabullenmen gerekir."
